SEARCH
Package seng201.team25.services

Class AvailableTowerManager

java.lang.Object
seng201.team25.services.AvailableTowerManager
public class AvailableTowerManager extends Object
Static class to hold all available towers for placement, either from the start screen or from the shop.

      public static void removeTowerOfType(int towerType)
      Removes a tower with a specified resource type from the list of available towers. Returns true if tower removed, false if no tower of specified type available.
      Parameters:
      towerType - Type of resource type to search for
